titleStmt.title: An olive-leaf, or, A bud of the spring viz. Christ's resurrection and its end, viz. the conversion of sinners and a Christians compleat reliefe / opened by Nicholas Lockyer ...
titleStmt.author: Lockyer, Nicholas, 1611-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.G. for J. Rothwell and are to be sold at his shop ... in Pauls church-yard ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
